mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.* , rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT s.*, c.subname, p.pname, t.tname FROM F_STATEMENT s INNER JOIN F_CLASS c ON c.cid = s.cid INNER JOIN F_PROGRAM p ON p.pid = c.pid INNER JOIN F_TEACHER t ON t.tid = p.tid ORDER BY s.stid DESC) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.* , rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT s.*, c.subname, c.start_date, p.pname, t.tname FROM F_STATEMENT s INNER JOIN F_CLASS c ON c.cid = s.cid INNER JOIN F_PROGRAM p ON p.pid = c.pid INNER JOIN F_TEACHER t ON t.tid = p.tid WHERE memid = #{memid} ORDER BY s.stid DESC) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_STATEMENT (stid, cid, memid, price) VALUES (SEQ_STATEMENTID.nextval, #{cid}, #{memid}, #{price})
